CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT is seen entering room and putting her belongings on table CHI follows behind MOT . INV is out of camera view
MOT is out of camera view
MOT takes a box down from the table
each word is stressed and detached
MOT sits down on chair and lays box on the floor in front of her
MOT partially out of camera view
MOT opens box and takes out book
MOT holds up book to show to CHI
CHI looks at book in MOT's hand and flaps her arms once
MOT turns the book to face CHI and points to picture on page
CHI looks at picture and moves toward MOT
CHI now out of camera view
MOT points to a picture on opposite page
MOT points to pictures on the page
MOT looks at CHI as she points to picture
INV enters room and requests MOT and CHI reposition themselves on the floor in the center of the room so as to be in camera view INV leaves and closes door
CHI gets up and runs around the room babbling loudly while MOT and INV talk
MOT picks up CHI and carries her over to the center of the floor
MOT carries CHI to center of room
MOT sets CHI down next to empty box and book now in the center of room on the floor
MOT sits down on floor next to CHI and picks up the book
CHI looks at MOT and points her finger
MOT opens book in front of CHI
MOT smiles and looks at CHI as she points to picture on opposite page
CHI is looking at book MOT is holding in front of her
MOT points to the picture again and looks up at CHI
CHI back is to the camera
CHI seems to be looking at the book
MOT slides her finger up the page to point to picture of undershirt
MOT points to another picture and looks at CHI
<bef> MOT turns page . MOT points to picture
MOT points to pictures on opposite page
CHI is looking at book MOT is holding in front of her but momentarily turns her head to glance at door and then turns back to the book
MOT is pointing to picture and looks at CHI
MOT points to picture . <4> MOT looks at CHI
MOT points to another picture <5> MOT looks at CHI
MOT slides her finger over picture of seesaw
CHI is looking at book which MOT is holding in front of her
MOT points to picture and looks up at CHI
MOT slides her finger across picture on opposite page
MOT points to picture at bottom of page
MOT looks up and smiles at CHI
MOT pats CHI on the knee
MOT points to pictures on cover of book and then looks at CHI
MOT holds book up in front of CHI
CHI gets up quickly and runs over to boxes
MOT puts book back in box
CHI points to boxes on table
CHI turns and points with both arms to boxes
MOT walks to table with box in her hands
MOT bumps her leg on the side of CHI's face as she walks back to table
CHI looks at MOT at table
CHI rubs the side of her face with her hand
CHI is watching MOT bring box to center of room
MOT lays box on center of floor next to CHI and opens it
CHI is sitting beside MOT watching her take puppets out of box
MOT sits down on floor next to CHI and puts a puppet on her hand
MOT holds puppet up in front of CHI
<bef> MOT slips Cookie Monster puppet on her right hand
CHI wiggles excitedly and points to puppets on MOT's hands
lexical items in quotations indicate discourse speakers attribute to puppet characters
CHI wiggles excitedly and points to puppets
CHI pulls puppets off of MOT's hands and drops them unto floor
CHI turns away from puppets and MOT
MOT picks up Cookie_Monster puppet off of floor
MOT slips Cookie_Monster puppet on her hand
CHI picks bird puppet off of floor
MOT has puppet open and closes mouth
<2> MOT playfully has puppet bite CHI on the arm
<2> MOT playfully has puppet bite CHI on the arm
CHI raises her hand with palm toward MOT and leans slightly backward
MOT grabs bird puppet out of CHI's hands
CHI holds her hands up to MOT
MOT slips bird puppet on CHI's right hand
MOT holds up her hand and opens and closes her fingers
MOT shakes CHI's right forearm back and forth
MOT slips Cookie_Monster puppet on her left hand
MOT has Cookie_Monster puppet playfully bite CHI on the arm
MOT has Cookie_Monster puppet nibble at CHI
CHI reaches for Cookie_Monster puppet on MOT's hand
MOT takes Cookie_Monster puppet off of her hand and slips it onto CHI's left hand
<4-7> MOT takes CHI's hands with puppets on them and taps them together four times
CHI slips puppets off of her hands and into empty box on floor
CHI turns and points to boxes on table
MOT puts cover on box with puppets
CHI points to boxes on table
MOT gets up and walks over to table
MOT walks back to center of room with box in her hand
CHI looks at MOT holding box
MOT leans down to put box on the floor then takes crayons and paper out and lays them on the floor next to CHI
MOT straightens up and stands over CHI
CHI lies on her stomach in front of paper
MOT sits down on floor next to CHI
CHI quickly comes to her knees turning around to point to boxes on table
MOT grabs a piece of paper out of the box and lays it beside CHI
CHI looks at boxes on table and points to them
CHI points to boxes on table then turns to look at MOT
CHI starts to stand up but then halts in semi-kneeling position as she looks at the desk
CHI stands up and points to boxes on table
MOT starts to pick up crayons and paper
CHI walks over to table and points to box then looks at MOT
CHI stands near the door and looks at MOT
MOT walks across the room with the drawing box
CHI walks back to center of room
MOT is out of camera view
CHI is standing watching MOT at table
MOT pulls the house out of the box
CHI walks over to the table
MOT is pulling box down off of table
play pieces fall out of box as MOT is taking it down
CHI points to doll on floor
MOT pulls house out of box and lays it on the floor
MOT now back in camera view
CHI leans down and picks up play piece
MOT steps aside and stands over CHI
CHI sits down next to house and begins to scoop the play pieces out of it
MOT sits down on the floor next to CHI
MOT takes car out of the garage
MOT is watching CHI play with play pieces
CHI looks at another room of the house
MOT leans over and looking into the house points out the two bed+rooms
CHI takes car and slides it into the garage
CHI takes car out of the garage
MOT leans over and looks at garage
CHI crawls around to rear of garage
MOT tries to open rear garage door

e.ga: slide the car in through the front door

u.a: MOT takes car and slides it into garage through front door
MOT starts to slides car through rear garage door
MOT looking closely at rear garage door
MOT trying to open rear garage door
CHI is at rear of garage door watching MOT's attempt

g.ga: put the car in the garage

u.a: MOT slides car out of garage through front door
CHI leans over garage to reach for car in MOT's hand
CHI grabs dolls which are seated in the car
CHI crawls over to front of house
MOT takes chair lying on the floor and put it on top of car
CHI picks up chair and tries to put it into another object
MOT is partially obstructing camera's view of CHI
MOT leans on the floor and looks at CHI who has chair in her hands
MOT's back is to the camera so it is not clear what she is doing
MOT turns house around so the interior is facing her
MOT puts the chair in one of the second floor rooms
MOT appears to be putting another chair into the house
MOT's back is to the camera partially obstructing view of her actions and of CHI
CHI appears to be taking pieces out of the house
CHI's playing in the house is obstructed by MOT
CHI picks up a bed from inside the house
CHI points to unidentified play pieces in one of the rooms
CHI leans back and looks at the house
MOT is leaning on floor watching CHI
CHI starts to take play pieces out of the rooms of the house
CHI takes two beds out of the house and lays them on the floor
<bef> CHI stops and glances around the room
MOT is leaning on floor watching CHI
CHI appears to grab a doll and put it into the car
MOT still partially obstructing camera's view of CHI
CHI puts the doll in the house
CHI excitedly crawls around to front of house .
CHI squirms around house excitedly and then stands up
<aft> MOT pats CHI on the hip
CHI walks around to interior of house and points to dolls inside
CHI is ambulating restlessly in front of house looking inside
CHI sits down next to house
CHI takes one doll out of the car
MOT points to front of house
CHI takes unidentified object from other side of house
CHI puts doll on the bed
<bef> CHI puts doll on the table
CHI puts unidentified play piece in the house
CHI leans back from the house and looks at it
squeaking noise heard outside of room
CHI momentarily turns her head and glances at door
CHI bounces up and swings her hand outward
CHI takes car and puts it in the garage
CHI attempts to push the car through the closed rear door of garage
CHI pulls car out of garage
CHI puts the chair in the garage
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI puts chair on the bed
CHI takes doll and puts it in the kitchen
CHI points to inside of house
MOT sits up straighter and comes closer to CHI
MOT playfully taps CHI on the knee several times
MOT accidentally knocks play piece out of CHI's hand
CHI points into a room of the house
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI puts bed back into house
CHI takes another play piece (unidentified) and puts it in the house
CHI points to another room of the house
CHI takes beds out of room on lower floor and begins to put them into one of the second floor rooms
CHI turns and looks at MOT
00:12:10 INV enters the room End of House
